document_data.name: Daffyd
document_data.mainbody: '''Daffyd''' was a stonemason who lived in [[Gracklstugh]]. He believed he was a [[Morndin]] of [[Clan Ironstar]].
document_data.Description: Daffyd had red beard braided in [[dwarven]] style.
document_data.History:
Daffyd was the son of merchants from [[Hammergate]]. He left his family when he was able to use an Ironstar mace his father had bought to an old dwarf, as Daffyd believe he was one of the fabled Morndin. He went to the north were he became the apprentice of the stonemason [[Ryordin Hammerfist]]. He later accompanied the twin dwarves [[Gamlin]] and [[Farrik]] to an unlucky expedition to [[Araumycos]] to get [[rock gourd]]s, were he meet another Morndin, [[Rook]].

Daffyd claimed he was the true creator of the [[motedisc]], and that Ryordin only merit was to stole the idea from him.
